additional_features.name: Swimming Pool & Patio
additional_features.description: A dedicated swimming pool area at the rear of the villa, accompanied by a shaded patio for relaxation. Designed to integrate with landscaping and provide visual balance.

vastu_considerations: The main entrance is oriented towards the north to invite positive energy.
Living and dining areas are centrally located to promote social interaction while maintaining balance.
Kitchen placement follows Vastu guidelines with a west-south orientation for optimum functionality.
Water features such as the swimming pool are situated in the south-east to maintain elemental balance.
remarks: This floor plan integrates traditional Chettinad design elements, split-level layout and local building norms with a modern twist suitable for a studio apartment villa on a 40x60 feet plot. Adjustments may be necessary to accommodate local regulations and specific client requirements.
